title: 1.9的新木牌指令是什么
author: Real_Scl
txt_content: RT，换了15w41b快照，用木牌指令变成乱码了，应该是木牌指令换了？

replies.author: scorpio975
replies.txt_content:
Real_Scl 发表于 2015-10-11 22:07
clickevent 怎么弄

{Text1:"{text:\\\"Click\\\",clickEvent:{action:\\\"run_command\\\",value:\\\"bl ...{Text1:"{"text":"Click","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"blockdata ~-1 ~ ~ {"Command":","}"}}"}复制代码
试试这个吧
将所有json项目全部添加引号即可
